Power Signal Menu Back TV STB Back Channel User Guide 1.Aim the Magic Cube at household electric appliances 2.Best to test three keys 3.Partial key is not easy to use 4.Remote control is not easy to use Infrared signal for controlling electric appliance is sent by Magic Cube,So please place Magic Cube in the place where household electric appliances can receive signal directly Best to test more then three keys. If you find that the remote control is not easy to use, you can change the next according to tips. There may be some keys not match with your home remote control, it will be resolved in the subsequent version. please choose the best use of your remote control. It is possible that your home remote control is a new model, which will be added in later versions. The set of your remote control is not successful?\n\n Please come to community of Orvibo to ask for help\n\n We will solve your problemat at the first time Select the TV that needs to bind Can turn on and off TV at %s page after bound it You don\'t have a TV remote

Smart Socket Smart Socket Door Lock Sensor Smoke Sensor Carbon Monoxide Sensor Combustible Gas Sensor Water Leakage Sensor Temperature & Humidity Detector Emergency Button Motion Sensor Door / Window Sensor Shade Clotheshorse Camera Remote Relay Sound Robot Zigbee IR Remote Control Magic Cube ZigBee smart remote control S20 Smart Socket YD Smart Socket Lincoln Smart Power Strip Mairun Smart clothes Other Smart Socket JiGuang serial Crown serial OUJIA Smart Hanger LiangBa Smart Clotheshorse AOKE Smart Hanger Zowee Camera EZVIZ Camera P2P Camera Lincoln Smart Power Strip Xiao E Smart Socket Lighting Magic cube Winplus Wi-Fi Strips Winplus Wi-Fi Socket Connect power and wait flashing red light Connect power and wait flashing red light Install battery and wait flashing red light Connect power and wait flashing blue light Put in battery, press the button on the device, wait until green light flashes. Put in battery, press the button on the device, wait until green light flashes. Connect device with power and network Install battery and wait flashing blue light Connect power and wait flashing red light Connect power and wait flashing red light Green light is not flashing? Green light is not flashing? Blue light is not flashing? If green light stops flashing, please press button once again. If green light stops flashing rapidly, please long press networking button for two seconds Plug Smart Socket into outlet，hold and press the button for 6 seconds untill the red light flashes. Connect to power, hold and press for 6 secs until Wi-Fi light flashes quickly Stick the back hole for 6s Connect to power, hold and press for 6 secs until WiFi light flashes quickly Plug Smart Socket into outlet，hold and press the button for 6 seconds untill the red light flashes. Dismantled anticlockwise the installation base of detector, then take out battery insulating strip to power on the device. Dismantled anticlockwise the installation base of detector, then take out battery insulating strip to power on the device. Plug Combustible Gas Sensor into socket Press networking button and check indication light status Green light keeps on after flashing rapidly for three seconds Green light keeps on after going out for three seconds This status means the device hasn’t been added into a hub Please add again after reset the device: \n Long press networking button for five seconds until green light stops flashing slowly, it means reset successfully Already reset, please try again Take out battery insulating strip to power on the device Take out battery insulating strip to power on the device Dismantled anticlockwise the installation base of detector, then take out battery insulating strip to power on the device. Long press networking button for two seconds until green light flash quickly. Long press networking button for five seconds until green light stops flashing slowly, then long press the button for two seconds until green light flash rapidly. Status Record Clear Unable to add device You didn\'t add any Hub. Go to add Press the button for 5 sec till green light flashes. Press the button once again when the light stop flashing. OK
Next Git it! Smart Switch Smart Outlet Scene Switch Dimmer Switch Connect to power，wait for until the light flashes Press button four times continuously, and hold on when pressing fifth time till blue light flashes quickly.Then press button again to get into pairing state.
1. Access Smart Hub into network and power on \n\n2. Start to add more devices(which are in the configuration mode) after the Smart Hub is added Start to add Add Smart Hub failed Can not find the Smart Hub Found a Smart Hub How to operate? Please try again after resetting the Hub Add again How to reset the Hub? Pleas long press the reset button for 5 seconds and wait for STA indicator light to flash. Wait for about 30 seconds until STA indicator light keeps on. Please poke the reset hole for 5 seconds and wait for STA light to flash. Wait for about 1 minute until STA light keeps on. All the data in the Hub will be deleted after resetting. 1.Please confirm the Hub has been connected with power and network together;\n2.Please confirm the Hub and mobile device connect to the same router.
